author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: A Tiny Fintech Firm Is Launching $100M Crypto Treasury Strategy, Including BTC, ETH
description: The firm plans to invest not only in bitcoin, but also in ether and "regulated stablecoins," funded through existing equity facility and an institutional partnership.
content:
Treasure Global (TGL), a publicly traded e-commerce and fintech firm, said it will invest up to $100 million in cryptocurrencies as part of a new capital strategy.
Half the funding comes from an exi… [+1196 chars]
